title: Hunter of the Night
description: An isolated town. A terrifying secret.In the Arizona desert, the startling discovery of a body dump brings FBI Paranormal Squad agents Oswald Bolton and Emory Wilmington halfway across the country, to a tiny middle-of-nowhere town called Caine. They expect to find a rogue vampire or werewolf or other supernatural creature roaming the low, craggy mountains and the arid, sandy terrain. A simple case. Open and shut.But what starts as a routine investigation spirals quickly into a nightmare, and Oz and Mori are left fighting for their lives. With no backup and no way out._____Hunter of the Night is a prequel novella set five years before the first full novel of the Lark Nation series, Speaker of the Lost.
author: Clara Coulson
